channel.title: math.RT updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.RT updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Horn inequalities on a quiver with an involution
item.description: arXiv:2601.05089v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Derksen and Weyman described the cone of semi-invariants associated with a quiver. We give an inductive description of this cone, followed by an example of refinement of the inequalities characterising anti-invariant weights in the case of a quiver equipped with an involution.
item.dc:creator: Antoine M\'edoc

item.title: $\Theta$-positive representations over real closed fields
item.description: arXiv:2601.05102v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: We develop the theory of $\Theta$-positive representations from general Fuchsian groups to linear groups over real closed fields. Our definition, which does not assume the boundary map to be continuous, encompasses many generalizations of positive or Anosov representations that have been considered in the literature.
item.dc:creator: Xenia Flamm, Nicolas Tholozan, Tianqi Wang, Tengren Zhang
